Chapter 3020: Chapter 1566: Mastering The Life-Sized Puppet, The Expert Fears The Unpredictable_One_3

Chapter 3020: Chapter 1566: Mastering the Life-sized Puppet, The Expert Fears the Unpredictable_One_3

“And to deal with someone who could even kill Taizai Ci, this Body of Consciousness must necessarily be preloaded with many abilities that surpass a demi-saint…”

Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes grew brighter and brighter.

Because Hallmaster Dao should have come directly, either to sabotage me or to bombard my memories away from Gold-Eroding Kui.

But now, he hasn’t come!

And that’s when something dramatic happened!

The vessel he left behind, carrying many of his secrets, was quietly waiting for someone else to discover them…

Although it was, passively triggered.

“Is this a problem?”

Xu Xiaoshou laughed heartily, realizing that what he faced was not fear but a Clone of Hallmaster Dao, equal in stature and in capacity for play.

No matter how well the secret was hidden, if one tested enough, something should surely come out, right?

“Hello?”

With a shift in mindset, Xu Xiaoshou transformed into a fun-lover, approaching Hallmaster Dao while waving his hand in greeting.

Hallmaster Dao leaned slightly backward, still beaming with a smile and not speaking, but his eyes seemed to exude a thread of disdain.

He retreated!

Xu Xiaoshou saw it all too clearly.

Did this life-sized doll *possess part of Hallmaster Dao’s personality, disliking it when someone got this close?

“Can I give you a kiss?”

Xu Xiaoshou leaned in closer, even puckering his lips.

Hallmaster Dao reached out as if he wanted to pinch Xu Xiaoshou’s cheek, but he still smiled and said,

“No, you can’t~”

Xu Xiaoshou dodged, while conjuring a hundred volitional giant hands, all of them bursting forward, aiming to tear Hallmaster Dao’s clothes apart:

“Can I take a look at your body, wahahaha!”

Smack, smack, smack, smack, smack…

Hallmaster Dao turned into a tentacle monster, his body erupting with an equal number of arms, each crushing Xu Xiaoshou’s volitional giant hands:

“No, you can’t~”

No? What did that matter!

After such experimentation, Xu Xiaoshou could tell that every time Hallmaster Dao resisted, the power of the Divine Secret would surge in his body.

And, as seen from the perspective of Weaving Expertise, every movement of this Body of Consciousness involved the operation of a Heaven Secrets spiritual array within.

“I’m giving you face here!”

A fierce grin spread across Xu Xiaoshou’s face as he conjured large hands to grab Hallmaster Dao’s crotch while simultaneously using his consciousness as a needle, threading it through, aiming at the divine pattern on Elder Dao’s chest.

Snap!

Divine Veins lit up on Hallmaster Dao’s body.

This time, just after Hallmaster Dao crushed Xu Xiaoshou’s volitional giant hand, a weaving spirit thread pierced into the main array of the divine pattern on his chest.

The beautifully made Heavenly Mechanism Embroidery Life Consciousness Map was thus marred by a bad thread, an atrocious destruction of all that was aesthetically pleasing—absolute vandalism to art!

Hallmaster Dao began to speak cheerfully:

“You can’t…”

Before he could utter the sickening “oh,” Xu Xiaoshou yanked the weaving spirit thread fiercely. Hallmaster Dao’s expression vibrated, and his body twitched grotesquely:

“You can’t-can’t-can’t-can’t…”

“Wahaha!” Xu Xiaoshou threw his head back and laughed hysterically, he had succeeded.

“Can’t-can’t-can’t-can’t…”

“Don’t scream~”

“Can’t-can’t-can’t-can’t…”

“Hahaha, Elder Dao the Flamboyant, even you have seen this day!”

“Can’t-can’t-oh~”

Suddenly, that bad thread was repaired by the divine pattern inside Hallmaster Dao.

It even had self-repairing capabilities?

Xu Xiaoshou was surprised but not disheartened. He had mastered a posture—no, a method to mess up Hallmaster Dao.

The duration of the “can’t-can’t-can’t” needed for repair provided him with a vast operational space.

He repeated the trick.

Grope, raise hand, weave thread…

Hallmaster Dao twitched for the second time: “You can’t-can’t-can’t…”

“Tell me, who am I?”

“Can’t-can’t-can’t…”

Huh?

Was it broken so quickly?

No, when this Body of Consciousness was placed inside Taizai Ci, maybe it didn’t recognize me yet?

Xu Xiaoshou changed his appearance, transforming into Bazhun’an:

“Say my name, and I’ll spare you your life.”

Hallmaster Dao: “Can’t-can’t Bazhun’an can’t-can’t oh~”

…

“Hahaha!”

Sangshui Cenbai, watching Xu Xiaoshou, who suddenly woke up and burst into laughter, fell into deep thought again.

Has he always been like this? Bai Zhou looked over with a glance that had successfully infiltrated the secret language system of the Saint Servants.

Just sometimes… Cen Qiaofu pulled the corner of his mouth, not really getting it.

How often then? Bai Zhou hesitated.

Cen Qiaofu wanted to spill more secrets but was stared down by Elder Sang with a glance.

“What’s with you now?” Elder Sang directly asked.

“Nothing much. I just thought of something interesting.” Xu Xiaoshou was excited and, without saying more, pulled out the Imitator and transformed into Hallmaster Dao.

“This…” Bai Zhou’s face showed a huge shock.

This Hallmaster Dao didn’t look like a disguise; from the inside out, from temperament to capabilities, even to micro-expressions and breathing…

It was exactly the same as the Hallmaster Dao from memory!

“Does it look similar?” Xu Xiaoshou spun around.

“What on earth are you trying to do?” Elder Sang frowned deeply.

“Hehe…” Xu Xiaoshou narrowed his eyes, revealing a sly expression, “The Way of the Heavens’ energy movement must not be disclosed~”

…

Soul Reading!

When Xu Xiaoshou, transformed into Hallmaster Dao, encountered the real one again, before he even acted, he saw an unexpected expression on the other Hallmaster Dao’s face.

“The original?”

Oh?

So aside from being stimulated to speak, you’ve mastered other languages as well?

But after that one sentence, Hallmaster Dao resumed his disgusting and inscrutable smile.

“You can’t disgust me anymore!”

Xu Xiaoshou became even more convinced that this life-sized doll held high authority and was operable.

He now set aside the issues of both Kui and Bei Huai, purely curious about Hallmaster Dao among the Ten High Nobles.

“Can’t-can’t-can’t…”

Yet again, after ruining Hallmaster Dao with a grope and weave, Xu Xiaoshou posed the question he was most eager to investigate:

“I am slightly weary. The Divine Thirty-Six Form has slipped my mind momentarily. My Clone, tell me, what is the essence of the Great God Descending Technique?”
